an10.2:4.1: * “Sīlavato, bhikkhave, sīlasampannassa na cetanāya karaṇīyaṃ:
an10.2:4.3: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ sīlavato sīlasampannassa avippaṭisāro uppajjati.
an10.2:4.6: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ avippaṭisārissa pāmojjaṃ jāyati.
an10.2:4.9: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ pamuditassa pīti uppajjati.
an10.2:4.12: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ pītimanassa kāyo passambhati.
an10.2:4.15: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati.
an10.2:4.18: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
an10.2:4.21: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati.
an10.2:4.22: Yathābhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, jānato passato na cetanāya karaṇīyaṃ:
an10.2:4.24: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati virajjati.
an10.2:4.25: Nibbinnassa, bhikkhave, virattassa na cetanāya karaṇīyaṃ:
an10.2:4.27: Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yaṃ nibbinno viratto vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ sacchikaroti.
an10.2:5.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nibbidāvirāgo vimuttiñāṇadassanattho vimuttiñāṇadassanānisaṃso;
an10.2:5.10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammā dhamme abhisandenti, dhammā dhamme paripūrenti apārā pāraṃ gamanāyā”ti.
